item.description:
What's New in DockFlow 1.55

Major New Feature

  • ExtraDock Integration – DockFlow now integrates with ExtraDock.app, a powerful macOS utility that allows you to create and manage custom additional docks on your Mac.
  • Hide and Show Extra Docks – Seamlessly control the visibility of your ExtraDock custom docks when switching between DockFlow presets.
  • Enhanced Workspace Management – Combine the power of DockFlow's preset system with ExtraDock's additional docks for complete workspace customization.
  • Optional and Flexible – This integration is completely optional and disabled by default. Enable it in settings when you're ready to use it.
  • ExtraDock 4 Support – Designed to work seamlessly with ExtraDock version 4, bringing together two powerful productivity tools.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback!
